input.text: Ein Credit Default Swap ist ein bilateraler Finanzkontrakt, bei dem eine Gegenpartei (der Absicherungskäufer) als Gegenleistung für eine Ausfallzahlung durch den Absicherungsverkäufer bei Eintritt eines Kreditereignisses eines Referenzemittenten eine regelmäßige Gebühr zahlt.

feedback: Should include legal markers (e.g. Abs., Nr., Art., Section) or law abbreviations (BGB, HGB, AktG).
Capture full legal references like Section 433 BGB or Art. 15 DSGVO.

rules.name: Extract Section References
rules.description: Captures legal references with section markers and their associated texts.

rules.name: Extract Paragraph and Article References
rules.description: Identifies references to paragraphs (Abs.) and articles (Art.) along with their numbers.

rules.name: Extract Legal Code Abbreviations
rules.description: Extracts abbreviations of German laws such as BGB, HGB, and AktG.

rules.name: Extract Full Legal References
rules.description: Captures complete legal references including terms, sections, and article definitions.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    pattern = r'(\u00a7\s*\d+(?:\s*Abs\.?\s*\d+)?|Art\.\s*\d+|BGB|HGB|AktG|KWG|WpHG|VVG)'
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    for match in matches:
        spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans

rules.name: Capture Other Legal Terms
rules.description: Identifies other legal terms that often appear in legal documents.

rules.name: Capture Dates Associated with Legal Texts
rules.description: Extracts dates that might be associated with legal documents or references.

rules.name: Ensure Non-Redundant Extraction
rules.description: Ensures that multiple matches do not cause duplicates in the output.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    seen = set()
    pattern = r'(\u00a7\s*\d+(?:\s*Abs\.?\s*\d+)?|Art\.\s*\d+|BGB|HGB|AktG|KWG|WpHG|VVG)'
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    for match in matches:
        if match.group(0) not in seen:
            seen.add(match.group(0))
            spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans

rules.name: Combine Multiple Legal References
rules.description: Concatenates multiple legal references that may appear in succession.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    pattern = r'(\u00a7\s*\d+(?:\s*Abs\.?\s*\d+)?|Art\.\s*\d+|BGB|HGB|AktG|KWG|WpHG|VVG)'
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    last_end = -1
    for match in matches:
        if match.start() > last_end:
            spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
            last_end = match.end()
    return spans

rules.name: Final Compliance Check
rules.description: Validates that all captured legal references comply with expected formats.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    pattern = r'(?=\\u00a7\\s*\\d+|Art\\.\\s*\\d+|BGB|HGB|AktG|KWG|WpHG|VVG)'
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    for match in matches:
        spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans
